title: Set hero section tagline text color to white

requirements.summary: Change the hero section tagline sentence text color to white without affecting any other styling or occurrences elsewhere.
acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page hero section, the specified sentence renders in white text.
No other instances of the same sentence (if present elsewhere) change color as a result of this update.
No other hero section styling (font size, spacing, shadows, etc.) is changed beyond the text color.

file_operations.description:
Update only the

element that contains “Experience exceptional accommodations and real estate services in one of Mexico's most beautiful colonial cities” to use a white text utility (e.g., replace the existing text color class with a white text class) so the change is scoped to the hero section and does not alter any other styles.
